nodes.text: The Bazaar of Esoteric Obscenities was a location which burned down a number of weeks after the Battle of Endor, in 4 ABY. Major Soran Keize, former Imperial pilot of the 204th Imperial Fighter Wing, had been present at the location when it had burned down.
The Bazaar of Esoteric Obscenities was first mentioned in the 2019 novel Alphabet Squadron, written by Alexander Freed.
